name: Bubble Pop 3D!
description:
Most addictive bubble shooter game.
Tap and pop the bubble pop hoops. Shoot multiple bubble pop hoops to get combo score.
Avoid shooting other color balloon that is different from pin.
Create your way to the bottom of cylinder by shooting the bubbles to complete the level.
New themes and Level updates every week, so stay connected.
Become a pro bubble shooter.
Destroy the bubble stacks
Achieve high scores and challenge your friends.
